name: ts-for-gir-node-gtk-gtk-4-custom-widget-example
description: This example shows the usage of custom widgets and virtual functions in node-gtk

scripts.build:types: yarn ts-for-gir generate Gtk-4.0 Gdk-4.0 Graphene-1.0 -e node --useNamespace -t esm
scripts.build: yarn run build:types && yarn run build:app
scripts.start: yarn run build && yarn run start:app
scripts.validate: yarn run validate:types && yarn run validate:app
